idea: Urbantech is developing tools to automate the design efforts of Solar Park. The application works on the AutoCAD for engineers to quickly and precisely design the utility-scale solar plants. The tool will be useful in all stages of solar plant development including pre-biding, concept planning, and detailed design.
name: UrbanTech Services LLP

idea:
LXME named after the Hindu Goddess of Wealth is a woman-first financial platform focused on reducing the financial gender disparity in India.

Founded in mid-2020, LXME is India’s 1st financial platform for women. The start-up aims to inspire a wave of financially fearless women independently managing their money and achieving their dreams. Targeting women across life stages, lifestyles and professions, LXME enables women with the right knowledge and tools to take charge of their personal finances offering the ability to Ask, Learn, Plan & Invest as per their goals via a simple mobile app.
name: LXME MONEY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The Proposed project is to manufacture High Gloss Inkjet Photo Paper, Matt Finish Paper & Thermal Lamination Film from 80 GSM to 250 GSM doing Multicoating with multifunctional coating machine to produce water based coated paper/film etc. and then converting them in various smaller sizes as per the orders and requirements. The Inkjet Glossy Photo paper, Matt Paper, PP, PET film is used for Digital Photography and all types of Digital printing and is made from readymade paper reels purchased from Paper mills.
name: COATEXO INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
“Tru Nutrition for healthy living” is the overarching mission of Truhealthy, which drives the company’s unwavering dedication to the pursuit of ongoing innovation. Providing a complete array of high quality nutritional supplements to meet your needs at every level is our goal. These supplements have been clinically studied to ensure that they’re good for health and well-being.

The mission of Truhealthy is “Tru Nutrition for healthy living.” and the company is steadfastly dedicated to pursuing the ongoing service of this mission.
name: TRUHEALTHY LLP

idea:
Pushpa Gas Equipments Is Manufacturing And Supplying A Range Of Electrical And Gas Operated

Commercial Kitchen Equipment & Utility Equipment.These Gas Kitchen Appliance, Commercial Hospitality Equipment Are Widely

Demanded By Various Hotels, Hospitals, Embassies, Resorts, Industries And Educational, Professional Institutions.In Addition, We

Also Meet The Requirements Of Cooling Equipment, Kitchen Refrigeration Equipment, Commercial Dish Washing Equipment,

Kitchen Exhaust System, Exhaust Hoods And L.p.g Gas System Including Gas Banks.
name: Pushpa Gas Equipments

idea: PP Electrosolar Private Limited is founded as a government-licensed Electrical and Solar EPC contractor agency. Our company provides services for the Supply, Erection, Testing, and Commissioning of Street Light, Overhead HT & LT Lines, Underground HT & LT Cables, Transformers, Substations, Panels, Commercial/Industrial/residential Electrification, Solar Power Plants, Turnkey Project, and electrical consultancy services. In addition, we offer solar power plant turnkey solutions. In addition, we offer maintenance services for overhead and subsurface electrical networks ranging from 33 kV to 11 kV and 22 kV to 11 kV.
name: PP ELECTROSOLAR PRIVATE LIMITED
